regularAbilities.name: Digital Manipulation
regularAbilities.description: Ability to interact with and manipulate digital environments remotely.

regularAbilities.name: Technological Communication
regularAbilities.description: Communicate directly with other digital beings and systems.

specialAbilities.name: Phantom Override
specialAbilities.description: Take control of any digital system momentarily, at the cost of health and energy.

specialAbilities.name: Quantum Presence
specialAbilities.description: Project presence in multiple digital locations simultaneously, costing health and energy.

regularAbilities.name: Adaptive Configuration
regularAbilities.description: Automatically reconfigure to adapt to various environments.

regularAbilities.name: Efficiency Optimization
regularAbilities.description: Optimize task execution for high efficiency.

specialAbilities.name: Organic Fusion
specialAbilities.description: Merge with organic systems temporarily for enhanced functionalities, at a health and energy cost.

specialAbilities.name: Swarm Coordination
specialAbilities.description: Coordinate with a swarm for collective action, consuming health and energy.

regularAbilities.name: Enhanced Sensory Perception
regularAbilities.description: Use integrated technology to enhance sensory capabilities.

regularAbilities.name: AI Assisted Decision-Making
regularAbilities.description: Leverage AI for improved decision-making and tactical analysis.

specialAbilities.name: Exo-Strength Surge
specialAbilities.description: Activate a temporary surge in physical strength, at a cost to health and energy.

specialAbilities.name: Nano-Repair
specialAbilities.description: Initiate rapid self-repair using nanotechnology, depleting health and energy.

regularAbilities.name: Genetic Adaptation
regularAbilities.description: Adapt genetic makeup in real-time for environmental resilience.

regularAbilities.name: Alien Physiology
regularAbilities.description: Utilize alien or animalistic features for specialized abilities.

specialAbilities.name: Morphological Shift
specialAbilities.description: Dramatically alter physical form for strategic advantage, expending health and energy.

specialAbilities.name: Bioluminescent Lure
specialAbilities.description: Create a distracting bioluminescent display that costs health and energy to execute.
